headline: Wisconsin Republican Sen. Ron Johnson will seek reelection
author: SCOTT BAUER
sentences: MADISON, Wis.  Republican U.S. Sen. Ron Johnson of Wisconsin, one of former President Donald Trump's biggest backers, announced Sunday that he will seek reelection in the battleground state, breaking his promise not to seek a third term.
Republican Wisconsin Assembly Speaker Robin Vos told the AP on Friday that there is "zero chance" of the Legislature taking over the awarding of the state's 10 presidential elector votes in 2024.
Mandela Barnes, who is seeking to become the state's first Black senator; Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry; state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski and Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson.

Johnson over the past year has been a leading voice in downplaying the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol riot and the coronavirus pandemic, in addition to remaining a vocal Trump supporter.
But Johnson rescinded the pledge in the lead-up to announcing his reelection bid, saying circumstances have changed after Democrats won the White House and control of Congress.
